markdownRemark.html: Fly Pole Marbella is a wonderful place to learn to pole dance and get fit. Ariel yoga, barre fitness and pole dancing classes for fun and a great work-out. This is a combination of dance and fitness and is great fun for birthday and hen parties or just to go along for the weekly sessions.
